## postgres.PostgresProviderProps interface

Props for the [postgres.PostgresProvider()](./cloud.postgres.postgresprovider.md) component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PostgresProviderProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [database](./cloud.postgres.postgresproviderprops.database.md) | <code>string</code> | Postgres database name as it would appear in the PGDATABASE environment variable |
|  [host](./cloud.postgres.postgresproviderprops.host.md) | <code>string</code> | Hostname for the Postgres database as it would appear in the PGHOST environment variable |
|  [password](./cloud.postgres.postgresproviderprops.password.md) | <code>string</code> | Postgres password as it would appear in the PGPASSWORD environment variable |
|  [user](./cloud.postgres.postgresproviderprops.user.md) | <code>string</code> | Postgres username as it would appear in the PGUSER environment variable |
